::: { style="font-size: 125%;" }

As a Systems Developer at the Department of Arts and Cultural Sciences I working at different Digital Humanities projects (primarily History), at different capacities.


In *Contentious Gatherings* I am responsible for developing, testing, running and maintaining the systems, databases and Machine Learning models that we use to collect, process and analyse data.


:::
